q: to take his British programme The X Factor to America this year, and speculation is rife over who will judge it. Jane Lynch insists the rumours can now end, as she has the perfect solution. People have asked me,` What about having Sue on The X Factor? How would she do?' I think she'd be fantastic- and there would be a few contestants reduced to tears, she laughed.`` It can never happen, though. Simon Cowell and Sue on the same judging panel will never work in a million years- there's only room for one ego on the show!

unfolding in Tahrir Square in central Cairo, stealing eight objects, among which was a statue of King Tutankhamun, according to Zahi Hawass , Egypt's Minister of State for Antiquities. Zahi Hawass described the statue as: a gilded wood statue of the 18th Dynasty king Tutankhamun being carried by a goddess . Apart from this, the eight pieces included`` parts of a gilded wood statue of Tutankhamun harpooning''. The pieces stolen have been described as being`` very valuable'', especially so the statue

said Bernie Sanders . Billions of dollars continued to flow to contractors even after they were found to have comMitt Romneyed fraud, and about a dozen had been barred from contracting altogether. Still, the report concluded that existing remedies with respect to contractor wrongdoing are sufficient. Bernie Sanders bridles at that finding, saying`` the DOD has got to be a lot more vigorous in terms of its investigations, and a lot more vigorous in prosecuting those people who have comMitt Romneyed fraud. One of the companies on the list is Raytheon Co.'s Integrated Defense Systems, which is based in Tewksbury. The company's inclusion in the report appears to stem from a dispute over a Patriot missile

.`` In deciding who should take the business forward, we wanted someone with the right mix of leadership, vision and hard-core engineering chops,'' Steve Ballmer said in an e-mail to all employees Wednesday. We wanted someone who could define the future of business computing and further expand our ability to bring the cloud to business customers and developers in game-changing ways. Steve Ballmer also said in his e-mail that Amithabh Srivastava, a senior vice president for Server and Tools who seemed the heir apparent, is leaving. It's unclear where Srivastava will go next.
